description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. 19 lines per page. Written in small naskh in black ink with use of red (with three dots underneath sīn). Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Light cream paper with laid and chain lines visible. Seal on fol. 9b. According to catchword, lacuna between fol. 47 and 48. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. According to the colophon of Text 2, copied by Muḥammad ibn Abī Ṭālib ibn Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad ibn Rajab in Ramaḍān 822 (fol. 117b).
author: Ibn Fahd, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 1356 or 7-1437 or 8.
abstract: Collection of several treatises on Shīʻī law.
contents: 5. fol. 165b-166b: Ghāyat al-ījāz li-khāʼif al-iʻwāz / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Fahd (d. 1437 or 8).
extent: 166 leaves : paper ; 175 x 135 (112 x 82) mm. bound to 173 x 148 mm.
title: al-Mūjiz al-ḥāwī li-taḥrīr al-fatāwī ... [etc.].
provenance: Ownership statement dated 1323 H. on fol. 61a and 130a. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: ابن فهد، احمد بن محمد
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Limp binding. Brown leather. Paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
